author: Dante Chinni
title: Race just one factor in COVID-19 risk
description: At this point, racial disparities around the virus are impossible to ignore, with African-Americans seeing higher rates of hospitalization and of fatalities.
content: WASHINGTON This week the racial disparities that have accompanied the coronavirus outbreak in the United States became a major story. Officials in St. Louis, Detroit and a large swath of states reported that African-American populations had been hit especiall… [+4191 chars]
